original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: and are not subtle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The nature of the condition of contact through the coming together of the eye is not profound;

original: phra ba ma yin no //üîΩrna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang @7a *//
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang @7a *//
translated: it is not subtle.

original: bzhin dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: bzhin dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The nature of the condition of contact through the coming together of the ear, the nature of the condition of contact through the coming together of the nose, the nature of the condition of contact through the coming together of the tongue, the nature of the condition of contact through the coming together of the body, and the nature of the condition of contact through the coming together of the mental faculty are not profound;

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: they are not subtle.

original: sa'i khams ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: sa'i khams ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The earth element is not profound;

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: it is not subtle.

original: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang; rnam par shes pa'i khams ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang; rnam par shes pa'i khams ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, and the consciousness element are not profound;

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: they are not subtle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The nature of the earth element is not profound.

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not subtle.

original: chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang / me'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang / rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang / me'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang / rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The nature of the water element, the nature of the fire element, the nature of the wind element, the nature of the space element, and the nature of the consciousness element are not profound.

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: They are not subtle.

original: ma rig pa ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: ma rig pa ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: Ignorance is not profound.

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not subtle.

original: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: Formations, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, and old age and death are not profound.

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: They are not subtle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The nature of ignorance is not profound.

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not subtle.

original: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang; ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang / skye mched drug gi rang bzhin dang / reg pa'i rang bzhin dang / tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang / sred pa'i rang bzhin dang / len pa'i rang bzhin dang /üîΩ@7b srid pa'i rang bzhin dang / skye ba'i rang bzhin dang / rga shi'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang; ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang / skye mched drug gi rang bzhin dang / reg pa'i rang bzhin dang / tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang / sred pa'i rang bzhin dang / len pa'i rang bzhin dang / @7b srid pa'i rang bzhin dang / skye ba'i rang bzhin dang / rga shi'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: the nature of consciousness, the nature of name-and-form, the nature of the six sense sources, the nature of contact, the nature of feeling, the nature of craving, the nature of grasping,

original: phra ba ma yin no //üîΩsbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: the nature of existence, the nature of birth, and the nature of old age and death are not profound and not subtle.

original: phra ba ma yin no //üîΩtshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of generosity is not profound and not subtle.

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of ethical discipline, the perfection of patient acceptance, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are not profound and not subtle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why, it is because

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The nature of the perfection of generosity is not profound;

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: it is not subtle.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The nature of the perfection of moral discipline, the nature of the perfection of patience, the nature of the perfection of perseverance, the nature of the perfection of concentration, and the nature of the perfection of wisdom are not profound;

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: they are not subtle.

original: nang stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: Inner emptiness is not profound;

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: it is not subtle.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: Up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not profound;

original: phra ba ma yin no //üîΩde ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: it is not subtle.üîΩIf you ask why, it is because the nature of inner emptiness is not profound;

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin; phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin; phra ba ma yin no //
translated: it is not subtle.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The nature of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is not profound,

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: it is not subtle.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are not profound,

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: they are not subtle.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni zab pa ma yin @8a *//
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni zab pa ma yin @8a *//
translated: The right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and noble eightfold path are not profound,

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: they are not subtle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The nature of the applications of mindfulness is not profound,

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: it is not subtle.

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The nature of the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and noble eightfold path is not profound,

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: it is not subtle.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The noble truths are not profound,

original: phra ba ma yin no //üîΩbsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no // bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: they are not subtle.

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The meditative concentrations, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless meditative stabilities, the aspects of liberation, the sequential meditative stabilities, the gateways of meditative stability, the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways, and the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation are not profound,

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: they are not subtle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The nature of the noble truths is not profound,

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: it is not subtle.

original: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /üîΩsmon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: the meditative stabilities, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless meditative stabilities, the gateways to liberation, the serial absorptions, the emptiness gateway to liberation, the signlessness gateway to liberation,

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: the wishlessness gateway to liberation, the extrasensory powers, the meditative stabilities, and the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways are not profound and not subtle.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni zab pa ma yin /üîΩphra ba @8b ma yin no //üîΩmi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni zab pa ma yin / phra ba @8b ma yin no // mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas are not profound and not subtle.

original: phra ba ma yin no;/üîΩde ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no;/ de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: The four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, up to and the knowledge of all aspects are not profound and not subtle.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: If you ask why, it is because the nature of the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas is not profound and not subtle.

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not subtle.

original: mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The nature of the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, the distinct attributes of a buddha, up to the knowledge of all aspects is not deep,

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: it is not subtle.

original: de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
analyzed: de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
translated: Then it occurred to those gods to think,

original: chos bstan pa 'di la ni gzugs su btags pa med do //
analyzed: chos bstan pa 'di la ni gzugs su btags pa med do //
translated: ‚ÄúIn this teaching of the Dharma there is no designation of form,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par btags pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness;

original: chos bstan pa 'di la ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar btags pa med do //
analyzed: chos bstan pa 'di la ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar btags pa med do //
translated: in this teaching of the Dharma there is no designation of the sense fields, elements, or dependent origination;

original: chos bstan pa 'di la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par btags pa med do //
analyzed: chos bstan pa 'di la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par btags pa med do //
translated: in this teaching of the Dharma there is no designation of the perfection of giving,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par btags pa med do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par btags pa med do //
translated: the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are not apprehended.

original: chos bstan pa 'di la ni nang stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
analyzed: chos bstan pa 'di la ni nang stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
translated: In this teaching of the Dharma, inner emptiness is not apprehended.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du btags pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du btags pa med do //
translated: up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not apprehended.

original: chos bstan pa 'di la ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun du btags pa med do //
analyzed: chos bstan pa 'di la ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun du btags pa med do //
translated: In this teaching of the Dharma, the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are not apprehended.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam @9a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam @9a *//

analyzed: de lta bas na la la @9b zhig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod cing /

translated: They should not conceptualize that the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty are unceasing.

original: 'gag pa med pa yid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩmig zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa yid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // mig zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

original: zhi ba mig ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhi ba mig ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They should not conceptualize that calm is the eyes.

original: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize that the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty are calm.

original: zhi ba yid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩmig dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: zhi ba yid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // mig dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize that calm is the mental faculty.üîΩThey should not conceptualize that the eyes are void.

original: dben pa mig ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dben pa mig ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They should not conceptualize that void is the eyes.

original: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize that the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty are void.

original: dben pa yid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dben pa yid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and ‚Äúsolitude‚Äù will not occur to him as a conceptual thought.

original: gzugs stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: gzugs stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: He will not think that form is empty,

original: stong pa nyid gzugs @14a *//üîΩzhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid gzugs @14a *// zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //

original: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /üîΩstong pa nyid chos zhes bya bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur / stong pa nyid chos zhes bya bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not think that sound, smell, taste, texture, or mental objects are empty,üîΩor that emptiness is sound, smell, taste, texture, or mental objects.

original: gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: He will not think that form is signless,

original: mtshan ma med pa gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //

original: sgra dang; dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /üîΩmtshan ma med pa chos zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //

translated: He will not think that sound, smell, taste, texture, or mental objects are signless,üîΩor that signlessness is sound, smell, taste, texture, or mental objects.

original: gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

original: smon pa med pa gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: smon pa med pa gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

analyzed: smon pa med pa chos zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // gzugs skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

analyzed: skye ba med pa gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

original: skye ba med pa chos zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩgzugs 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: skye ba med pa chos zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // gzugs 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

analyzed: 'gag pa med pa gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They should not conceptualize that unceasing is form.

analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos 'gag pa med @14b ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not entertain the idea that sounds, smells, tastes, tangibles, and mental phenomena are unceasing.

original: 'gag pa med pa chos zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩgzugs zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa chos zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

original: zhi ba gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhi ba gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: zhi ba chos zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // gzugs dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

original: dben pa gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dben pa gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //

original: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

original: dben pa chos zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dben pa chos zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize the sense field of ear contact, the sense field of nose contact, the sense field of tongue contact, the sense field of body contact, or the sense field of mind contact as aspirationless,

original: smon pa med pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩmig gi 'dus te reg pa skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: smon pa med pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // mig gi 'dus te reg pa skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: nor should they conceptualize aspirationlessness as the sense field of mind contact.üîΩThey should not conceptualize the sense field of eye contact as non-arising,

original: skye ba med pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar @16b rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye ba med pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar @16b rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: nor should they conceptualize non-arising as the sense field of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize that the composite of contact at the ear, the composite of contact at the nose, the composite of contact at the tongue, the composite of contact at the body, and the composite of contact at the thought sense source is arising.

original: skye ba med pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩmig gi 'dus te reg pa 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: skye ba med pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // mig gi 'dus te reg pa 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize that the composite of contact at the thought sense source is non-arising.üîΩThey should not conceptualize that the composite of contact at the eye is non-ceasing.

original: 'gag pa med pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They should not conceptualize that the composite of contact at the eye is non-arising.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang; yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang; yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize that the composite of contact at the ear, the composite of contact at the nose, the composite of contact at the tongue, the composite of contact at the body, and the composite of contact at the thought sense source is non-ceasing.

original: 'gag pa med pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩmig gi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: they will not imagine that the non-arising of mental contact is the mind.üîΩThey will not imagine that visual contact is calm,

original: zhi ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhi ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: nor will they imagine that calm is visual contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not imagine that auditory, olfactory, gustatory, tactile, and mental contact is calm,

original: zhi ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩmig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: zhi ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: nor will they imagine that calm is mental contact.üîΩThey will not imagine that visual contact is void,

original: dben pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dben pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: nor will they imagine that voidness is visual contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa @17a *//
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa @17a *//
translated: They will not imagine that auditory, olfactory, gustatory, tactile, and mental contact is void,

original: dang; lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /üîΩdben pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩmig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dang; lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur / dben pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceive of the contact that is the coming together of the eye, form, and eye consciousness as calm or not calm.üîΩThey will not conceive of the contact that is the coming together of the eye, form, and eye consciousness as void or not void.üîΩThey will not conceive of the contact that is the coming together of the eye, form, and eye consciousness as afflicted or purified.üîΩThey will not conceive of the contact that is the coming together of the eye, form, and eye consciousness as arising or ceasing.üîΩThey will not conceive of the contact that is the coming together of the eye, form, and eye consciousness as being pure or impure.üîΩThey will not conceive of the contact that is the coming together of the eye, form, and eye consciousness as being entities or as non-entities.üîΩThey will not conceive of the contact that is the coming together of the eye, form, and eye consciousness as being something to be attained or not attained.

original: stong pa nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩrna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩrna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
translated: They will not conceive of the contact that is the coming together of the eye, form, and eye consciousness as being something to be appropriated or not to be appropriated.üîΩThey will not conceive of the contact that is the coming together of the eye, form, and eye consciousness as being something to be cultivated or not to be cultivated.üîΩThey will not conceive of the contact that is the coming together of the eye, form, and eye consciousness as being something to be thoroughly understood or not to be thoroughly understood.üîΩThey will not conceive of the contact that is the coming together of the eye, form, and eye consciousness as being something to be abandoned or not to be abandoned.üîΩThey will not conceive of the contact that is the coming together of the eye, form, and eye consciousness as being something to be purified or not to be purified.üîΩThey will not conceive of the contact that is the coming together of the eye, form, and eye consciousness as being something to be manifested or not to be manifested.üîΩThey will not conceive of the contact that is the coming together of the eye, form,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is mentally compounded as empty.

original: stong pa nyid yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They should not conceptualize emptiness as the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is mentally compounded.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded as signless.

original: mtshan ma med pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They should not conceptualize signlessness as the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
translated: They should not conceptualize the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is audibly compounded, the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is nasally compounded, the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is gustatorily compounded, or the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is tactilely compounded as wishless.üîΩThey should not conceptualize wishlessness as the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is tactilely compounded.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med @17b ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med @17b ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is mentally compounded as having signs.

original: mtshan ma med pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They should not conceptualize the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is mentally compounded as signless.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact with the eye as having aspirations.

original: smon pa med pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: smon pa med pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They should not conceptualize the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact with the eye as lacking aspirations.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
translated: They should not conceptualize the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact with the ear, the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact with the nose, the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact with the tongue, the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact with the body,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the mind sense-sphere as ‚Äòwishless.‚Äô

original: smon pa med pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: smon pa med pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They should not conceptualize ‚Äòwishless‚Äô as the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the mind sense-sphere.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the eye sense-sphere as ‚Äònot arisen.‚Äô

original: skye ba med pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye ba med pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They should not conceptualize ‚Äònot arisen‚Äô as the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the eye sense-sphere.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
translated: They should not conceptualize the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the ear sense-sphere, the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the nose sense-sphere, the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the tongue sense-sphere, the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the body sense-sphere,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /üîΩskye ba med pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las @18a *//
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur / skye ba med pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las @18a *//
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate the arising of feelings that arise from the condition of sensory contact through the coming together of the mind.

original: byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate the non-arising of feelings that arise from the condition of sensory contact through the coming together of the mind.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate the cessation of feelings that arise from the condition of sensory contact through the coming together of the eyes.

original: 'gag pa med pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate the non-cessation of feelings that arise from the condition of sensory contact through the coming together of the eyes.üîΩThey do not conceptually differentiate the cessation of feelings that arise from the condition of sensory contact through the coming together of the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate the non-cessation of feelings that arise from the condition of sensory contact through the coming together of the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize that the feeling that arises from the condition of the mental faculty is not annihilated.

original: 'gag pa med pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They should not conceptualize that the nonannihilation of the feeling that arises from the condition of the mental faculty is the feeling that arises from the condition of the mental faculty.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: ‚ÄúThey should not conceptualize that the feeling that arises from the condition of the visual faculty is calm.

original: zhi ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhi ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They should not conceptualize that the calm state is the feeling that arises from the condition of the visual faculty.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
translated: They should not conceptualize that the feeling that arises from the condition of the auditory faculty, the feeling that arises from the condition of the olfactory faculty, the feeling that arises from the condition of the gustatory faculty, the feeling that arises from the condition of the tactile faculty,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: and the feeling that arises from the condition of the mental faculty is calm.

original: zhi ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhi ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not conceptualize that the feeling that arises from the mental contact of the mind is peace.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg @18b pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg @18b pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize that the feeling that arises from the contact of the eye is void.

original: dben pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dben pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not conceptualize that voidness is the feeling that arises from the contact of the eye.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
translated: They will not conceptualize that the feeling that arises from the contact of the ear, the feeling that arises from the contact of the nose, the feeling that arises from the contact of the tongue, the feeling that arises from the contact of the body,üîΩand the feeling that arises from the contact of the mind is void.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /üîΩdben pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /üîΩdben pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not conceptualize that voidness is the feeling that arises from the contact of the mind.‚Äù

original: sa'i khams stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: sa'i khams stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceive of the earth element as empty.

original: stong pa nyid sa'i khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid sa'i khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceive of emptiness as the earth element.

original: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceive of the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, or the consciousness element as empty.

original: stong pa nyid rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceive of emptiness as the consciousness element.

translated: They will not construe the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline, the transcendent perfection of tolerance, the transcendent perfection of perseverance, the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration, and the transcendent perfection of wisdom as being isolated, nor will they construe isolation as the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

analyzed: mtshan ma med pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not conceive of the emptiness of external phenomena as a sign,üîΩnor will they conceive of a sign as the emptiness of external phenomena.üîΩThey will not conceive of the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena as a sign,üîΩnor will they conceive of a sign as the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena.üîΩThey will not conceive of the emptiness of emptiness as a sign,üîΩnor will they conceive of a sign as the emptiness of emptiness.üîΩThey will not conceive of the emptiness of the great as a sign,üîΩnor will they conceive of a sign as the emptiness of the great.üîΩThey will not conceive of the emptiness of ultimate reality as a sign,üîΩnor will they conceive of a sign as the emptiness of ultimate reality.üîΩThey will not conceive of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena as a sign,üîΩnor will they conceive of a sign as the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

translated: They will not conceive of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena as a sign,üîΩnor will they conceive of a sign as the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.üîΩThey will not conceive of the emptiness of the unlimited as a sign,üîΩnor will they conceive of a sign as the emptiness of the unlimited.üîΩThey will not conceive of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end as a sign,üîΩnor will they conceive of a sign as the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.üîΩThey will not conceive of the emptiness of inherent existence as a sign,üîΩnor will they conceive of a sign as the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceive of the emptiness of all phenomena as a sign,üîΩnor will they conceive of a sign as the emptiness of all phenomena.

analyzed: smon pa med pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //

translated: nor will they conceive of a sign as the emptiness of the nonexistence of things.üîΩThey will not conceive

analyzed: skye ba med pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

analyzed: skye ba med pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // nang stong pa nyid 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

translated: They will not entertain the idea that the emptiness of essential nature of non-entities is cessation.

translated: They will not entertain the idea that calm is inner emptiness.üîΩThey will not entertain the idea that the emptiness of essential nature of non-entities is calm.

analyzed: dben pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: stong pa nyid dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar rnams par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not conceive of emptiness as the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog pa mi 'gyur /

analyzed: stong pa nyid 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: smon pa med pa dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptually identify the applications of mindfulness as having aspirations or as being without aspirations, and so on up to:üîΩThey do not conceptually identify the noble eightfold path as having aspirations or as being without aspirations.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

translated: They will not conceive of the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, or the noble eightfold path as wishless,

analyzed: skye ba med pa dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

original: 'gag pa med pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩdran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not entertain the idea that the noble eightfold path is not blocked.üîΩThey will not entertain the idea that the applications of mindfulness are calm.

original: zhi ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhi ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not entertain the idea that calm is the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang; byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang; byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not entertain the idea that the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path are calm.

original: zhi ba 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩdran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: zhi ba 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize that the noble eightfold path is peace.üîΩThey will not conceptualize that the four establishments of mindfulness are void.

original: dben pa dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dben pa dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not conceptualize that voidness is the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize that the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven aspects of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path are void.

original: dben pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dben pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not conceptualize that voidness is the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya @24b bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya @24b bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize that the noble truths are empty.

original: stong pa nyid 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩsangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

translated: They will not conceptualize that emptiness is the noble truths.üîΩThey will not conceptualize that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are empty.

original: stong pa nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩ'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize that emptiness is the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.üîΩThey will not conceptualize that the noble truths are signless.

original: mtshan ma med pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩsangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize that signlessness is the noble truths.üîΩThey will not conceptualize that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are signless.

original: mtshan ma med pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not conceptualize that signlessness is the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate the four noble truths as being wishless.

original: smon pa med pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩsangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: smon pa med pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

analyzed: smon pa med pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

translated: and they will not entertain the idea that emptiness is the compounded element.üîΩThey will not entertain the idea that the compounded element is signless,üîΩand they will not entertain the idea that the signless is the compounded element.

translated: all the emptinesses, the four establishments in mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of manifestation, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the eightfold noble path, the four noble truths, the four meditative stabilizations,

translated: the four immeasurables, the four formless meditative absorptions, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, the emptiness gate of liberation, the absence of attributes gate of liberation,üîΩ

translated: the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, the wishlessness gate of liberation, the five clairvoyances, all the meditative stabilizations, all the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways, the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

analyzed: des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhes mi bya'am /

translated: ‚ÄúOr, ‚ÄòI will never let the Dharma that I have heard from those Buddha Bhagavats be interrupted until I have attained omniscience‚Äô‚Äî

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyang rgya cher bstan to //

translated: Up to: they will have a ready speech which is superior to all the worlds and distinguished.üîΩAnd that by way of not taking anything as a basis.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis she na /

original: bdag mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang /üîΩmthong ba po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba dang /

translated: It is the way of not apprehending a self, and the way of not apprehending a being, a living being, one born of Manu, humanity, one who lives, a person, an individual, one who does, one who feels, one who knows, and one who sees.üîΩIt is the way of not apprehending form, and the way of not apprehending feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness. It is the way of not apprehending the eyes, and the way of not apprehending the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind.

original: sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /

translated: It is the way of not apprehending a form, and the way of not apprehending a sound, a smell, a taste, a feeling, and a dharma. It is the way of not apprehending the eye consciousness,

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /üîΩrna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: It is the non-apprehension of the ear consciousness, nose consciousness, tongue consciousness, body consciousness, and mind consciousness. It is the non-apprehension of eye contact.üîΩIt is the non-apprehension of ear contact, nose contact, tongue contact, body contact, and mind contact. It is the non-apprehension of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus @29b te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus @29b te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
translated: It is the non-apprehension of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact, and the feeling that arises from the condition of mind contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way the feeling that arises from the sensory contact that is the union of mind and mental phenomena is non-apprehensible, the way the earth element is non-apprehensible, the way the water element, the way the fire element, the way the wind element, the way the space element, and the way the consciousness element are non-apprehensible,

original: ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang; srid pa dang / skye ba dang /

translated: ‚Äú≈öƒÅriputra, bodhisattva great beings training like that do not train in eye consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i mig gi rnam par shes pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i mig gi rnam par shes pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: In this way, they do not see that eye consciousness in which they should train.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par @36b shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi slob ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par @36b shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi slob ste /
translated: He does not train in the ear consciousness, nose consciousness, tongue consciousness, body consciousness, or mind consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: It is because he does not see that mind consciousness in which he should train.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi slob ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi slob ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBodhisattva great beings training like that do not train in the contact that is the coming together of eye, form, and eye consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩde ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i yig gi 'dus te reg pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i yig gi 'dus te reg pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Why is that?üîΩIt is because he does not see that contact that is the coming together of eye, form, and eye consciousness in which he should train.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi slob ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi slob ste /
translated: He does not train in the contact that is the coming together of ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind,

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na; 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na; 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: If you ask why, it is because they do not consider the mental contact in which they should train.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi slob ste /üîΩde ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi slob ste / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúBodhisattva great beings who train in that way do not train in the feeling that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the eyes.

original: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: If you ask why, it is because they do not consider the feeling that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the eyes in which they should train.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang; yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi slob ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang; yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi slob ste /
translated: They do not train in the feeling that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the ears, the feeling that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the nose, the feeling that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the tongue, the feeling that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the body, or the feeling that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the mind.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why, it is because they do not consider the feeling that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the mind in which they should train.

original: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de yang dag par rjes @37a *//
analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de yang dag par rjes @37a *//
translated: In this way, the feeling that is conditioned by sensory contact that is mentally compounded, in which one should train, is also utterly unarisen.

original: su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: su mi mthong ngo //
translated: In this way, they do not see the feeling that is a condition due to the convergence of mental phenomena, which is what they would train in.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni sa'i khams la mi slob ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni sa'i khams la mi slob ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBodhisattva great beings who train like this do not train in the earth element.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i sa'i khams de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i sa'i khams de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Because they do not see the earth element, which is what they would train in.

original: chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi slob ste /
analyzed: chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi slob ste /
translated: They do not train in the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, or the consciousness element.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Because they do not see the consciousness element, which is what they would train in.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni ma rig pa la mi slob ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni ma rig pa la mi slob ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBodhisattva great beings who train like this do not train in ignorance.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i ma rig pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i ma rig pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: In this way, they do not see the ignorance in which they should train.

original: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la mi slob ste /
analyzed: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la mi slob ste /
translated: They do not train in the volitional factors, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, existence, birth, and aging and death.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rga shi de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings who train like that

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob ste /
translated: do not train in the perfection of generosity.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus @37b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob ste / de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug @38a *//
translated: ‚ÄúThey do not train in the four noble truths,üîΩthe dhyƒÅnas, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless absorptions,

translated: the aspects of liberation, the aspects of correct exertion, the aspects of the bases of supernatural power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the path.üîΩ‚ÄúThey do not train in the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi slob ste /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi slob ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThey do not train in the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas, the four assurances, the four unhindered discernments, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

translated: ‚ÄúWhy is that?
