analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: It is because they do not consider those distinct attributes of the buddhas in which they should train.‚Äù

translated: and they do not train in the knowledge of path aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: It is because they do not see that all-knowledge in which they should train.

analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: said to the elder Subh≈´ti,

translated: ‚ÄúVenerable monk Subh≈´ti,

analyzed: gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

analyzed: ci'i phyir na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

analyzed: ci'i phyir na skye mched dang / @38b khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why do they not see the sensory bases, the physical elements, and dependent origination?

translated: Why do they not see the noble truths, the meditative stabilities, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless meditative stabilizations, the eight deliverances, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, emptiness,

translated: the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.üîΩThey do not see the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, the great love, the great compassion, the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, or the thirty-two major marks of a great being.üîΩThey do not see the eighty minor marks, the ten powers, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great love, great compassion, the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, or the thirty-two major marks of a great being.üîΩThey do not see the eighty minor marks, the ten powers, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great love, great compassion, the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, or the thirty-two major marks of a great being.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /üîΩrnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

translated: They do not see the eighty minor marks, the ten powers, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great love, great compassion, the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, or the thirty-two major marks of a great being.

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /üîΩkoo shi ka /üîΩde ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo //üîΩtshor ba tshor bas stong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa / koo shi ka / de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo // tshor ba tshor bas stong ngo //
translated: They do not see the eighty minor marks, the ten powers, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great love, great compassion, the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, or the thirty-two major marks of a great being.üîΩThey do not see the eighty minor marks, the ten powers, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great love, great compassion, the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, or the thirty-two major marks of a great being.

original: 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ngo //
translated: They do not see the eighty minor marks, the ten powers, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great love, great compassion, the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, or the thirty-two major marks of a great being.

original: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ngo //üîΩrnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo //

translated: the sense fields, the components of perception, and dependent origination are empty of dependent origination.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan @39a *//
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan @39a *//
translated: The perfections, all the aspects of emptiness, the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment, the noble truths,

original: dang; tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang /
analyzed: dang; tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang /
translated: the meditative concentrations, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless meditative stabilities, the aspects of liberation, the serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness, the aspects of supernormal knowledge,

original: ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo; ;koo shi ka /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo; ;koo shi ka /
translated: the emptiness of the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gzugs stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //üîΩtshor ba stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //üîΩ'du shes stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // 'du shes stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúKau≈õika, the emptiness of form does not see the emptiness of form.üîΩThe emptiness of feeling does not see the emptiness of feeling.

original: 'du byed stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'du byed stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of perception does not see the emptiness of perception.üîΩThe emptiness of volitional factors does not see the emptiness of volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of consciousness does not see the emptiness of consciousness.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the knowledge of all aspects does not see the emptiness of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: koo shi ka /üîΩde ltar gang stong pa nyid 'di la slob pa de ni gnyis su med pas stong pa nyid la slob pa ste /
analyzed: koo shi ka / de ltar gang stong pa nyid 'di la slob pa de ni gnyis su med pas stong pa nyid la slob pa ste /
translated: Kau≈õika,üîΩthose who train in this emptiness train in nonduality.

original: de gnyis su byar med @39b par gzugs stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med @39b par gzugs stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of form, which is not made into two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness, which is not made into two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: the emptiness of the elements, and the emptiness of dependent origination, without making any distinction between these.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of the perfections,

original: de gnyis su byar med par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of all the emptinesses, the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment, the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang /
translated: the deliverances, the complete conquerings, the emptiness, the signless, and the wishless, the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar stong pa nyid la slob bo; ;koo shi ka /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar stong pa nyid la slob bo; ;koo shi ka /
translated: They train in the emptiness of the thus-gone, the emptiness of the powers of the thus-gone, the emptiness of the fearlessnesses of the thus-gone, the emptiness of the detailed and thorough knowledges of the thus-gone, the emptiness of the distinct attributes of the thus-gone, and the emptiness of omniscience.

original: gzugs stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa de ni /
analyzed: gzugs stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa de ni /
translated: Kau≈õika, those who train in the emptiness of form without making a division into two, those who train in the emptiness of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness without making a division into two, and those who train in the emptiness of the knowledge of all aspects without making a division into two,

original: gnyis su byar med par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo //
translated: train in the perfection of giving without making a division into two.

original: de @40a *// gnyis su byar med par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo //
analyzed: de @40a *// gnyis su byar med par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo //
translated: They train in the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom without making anything into a pair.

original: de ni gnyis su byar med par nang stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de ni gnyis su byar med par nang stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in inner emptiness without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of the compounded, the emptiness of the uncompounded, limitless emptiness, and the emptiness of inherent existence without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of all phenomena without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of nonobservation without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of nonentities without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of the entity without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of the nonentity without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of the ultimate without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of the conditioned without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of the unconditioned without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of the beginningless and endless without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of nonrepudiation without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of nature without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of all phenomena without making anything into a pair.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob bo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of specific characteristics without making anything into a pair.

original: de ni gnyis su byar med par dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la slob bo //
analyzed: de ni gnyis su byar med par dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of nonobservation without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of nonentities without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of entities without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of nonentities without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of the ultimate without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of the conditioned without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of the unconditioned without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes without making anything into a pair.

original: de ni gnyis su byar med par yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob bo //

translated: They train in the emptiness of the beginningless and endless without making anything into a pair.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of nonre

original: de ni gnyis su byar med par 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: de ni gnyis su byar med par 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: They train in the noble truths,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
translated: the dhyƒÅnas, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless absorptions, the aspects of liberation, the aspects of correct exertion, the aspects of the bases of spiritual power, the powers of the tathƒÅgatas, the strengths of the tathƒÅgatas, the aspects of enlightenment, the aspects of the path, the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.üîΩThey train in the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, and the emptiness of essential nature.üîΩThey train in the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the five powers, the five strengths, the seven aspects of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path.üîΩThey train in the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, and the eighteen distinct attributes of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob bo //üîΩde ni gnyis su byar med par rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / @40b dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / sangs rgyas nyid dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob bo //üîΩde ni gnyis su byar med par rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / @40b dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / sangs rgyas nyid dang /
translated: They train in the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment.

analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo // gnyis su byar med par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gang slob pa dang / gnyis su byar med par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

translated: It is to train without making any division in the applications of mindfulness,üîΩto train without making any division in the noble eightfold path, to train without making any division in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

translated: to train without making any division in the result of stream enterer, to train without making any division in , up to and including the state of a worthy one, to train without making any division in a pratyekabuddha‚Äôs awakening, to train without making any division in the knowledge of path aspects,

original: nyid kyi bar la gang slob pa de ni /
analyzed: nyid kyi bar la gang slob pa de ni /
translated: The one who trains in this is the bodhisattva.üîΩ

original: gnyis su byar med par sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med pa la slob bo //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med par sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med pa la slob bo //
translated: He trains in the immeasurable, incalculable Buddhadharmas without making any discrimination.

original: gnyis su byar med par sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med pa la gang slob pa de ni /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med par sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med pa la gang slob pa de ni /
translated: He trains in the immeasurable, incalculable Buddhadharmas without making any discrimination.

original: gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //üîΩtshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to increase or decrease form.üîΩHe does not train in order to increase or decrease feeling, perception, volitional formations, or consciousness.

original: skye mched dang / khams 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to increase or decrease the sense fields or the elements.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to increase or decrease dependent origination.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to increase or decrease the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'phel bar bya ba dang /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'phel bar bya ba dang /
translated: They do not train in the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom in order to increase or decrease them.

original: 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo; ;nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo; ;nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature in order to increase or decrease them.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in the applications of mindfulness in order to increase or decrease them.

translated: He does not train in order to increase or decrease the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the deliverances, the complete conquerings, the emptiness,
